title: Did i miss something?
body: Usually whenever I fail a promo, I drop down to 75 LP consistently. But this last promo failure dropped me to 62 LP. Is there a reason for this somewhere that I missed? if this is intended then wtf. Now I have to win at least 2 games to be in promos again guaranteed. At 75 there was that low chance of gaining 25 LP on a win and re-qualifying right away which was rare but nice. I also had less threat of loosing 3 games in a row (which is quite common) and being at 0 LP since looses rarely dropped more than 20-21 LP. So did I miss an update for this or what?

replies.body: Cause u lost 2 in a row. When u are on 100 LP and u win promo game, u dont get LP. But u lose it. So if u go like 1 loss 1 win 1 loss, u will end up on 75. But if u win 1 then lose 2 in a row, u will go under 75.
Ah, that makes more sense. I thought it was a hard 75 LP since it happened so often for me.
Even if you're in series, you don't gain lp, but you an still lose lp... even though it won't show. tbh, if you lose multiple times in a row, this is common
